1: וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>thou shalt say</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And in that day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>I</n> אוֹדְךָ֣ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>I will praise</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָנַ֖פְתָּ <sup>599 </sup> <n>thee though thou wast angry</n> בִּ֑י יָשֹׁ֥ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>is turned away</n> אַפְּךָ֖ <sup>639 </sup> <n>with me thine anger</n> וּֽתְנַחֲמֵֽנִי׃ <sup>5162 </sup> <n>and thou comfortedst</n>
2: הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אֵ֧ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>Behold God</n> יְשׁוּעָתִ֛י <sup>3444 </sup> <n>[is] my salvation</n> אֶבְטַ֖ח <sup>982 </sup> <n>I will trust</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶפְחָ֑ד <sup>6342 </sup> <n>and not be afraid</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עָזִּ֤י <sup>5797 </sup> <n>[is] my strength</n> וְזִמְרָת֙ <sup>2176 </sup> <n>and [my] song</n> יָ֣הּ <sup>3050 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>JEHOVAH</n> וַֽיְהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has become</n> לִ֖י לִֽישׁוּעָֽה׃ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>he also is become my salvation</n>
3: וּשְׁאַבְתֶּם־ <sup>7579 </sup> <n>shall ye draw</n> מַ֖יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> בְּשָׂשׂ֑וֹן <sup>8342 </sup> <n>Therefore with joy</n> מִמַּעַיְנֵ֖י <sup>4599 </sup> <n>out of the wells</n> הַיְשׁוּעָֽה׃ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>of salvation</n>
4: וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֞ם <sup>559 </sup> <n>shall ye say</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And in that day</n> הַה֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> הוֹד֤וּ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>Praise</n> לַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> קִרְא֣וּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>call</n> בִשְׁמ֔וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>upon his name</n> הוֹדִ֥יעוּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>declare</n> בָֽעַמִּ֖ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>among the people</n> עֲלִֽילֹתָ֑יו <sup>5949 </sup> <n>his doings</n> הַזְכִּ֕ירוּ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>make mention</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נִשְׂגָּ֖ב <sup>7682 </sup> <n>is exalted</n> שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>that his name</n>
5: זַמְּר֣וּ <sup>2167 </sup> <n>Sing</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> גֵא֖וּת <sup>1348 </sup> <n>excellent things</n> עָשָׂ֑ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>for he hath done</n> [מְיֻדַּעַת כ] (מוּדַ֥עַת <sup>3045 </sup> <n>acknowledge</n> ק) זֹ֖את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>throughout</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in all the earth</n>
6: צַהֲלִ֥י <sup>6670 </sup> <n>Cry out</n> וָרֹ֖נִּי <sup>7442 </sup> <n>and shout</n> יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <sup>3427 </sup> <n>thou inhabitant</n> צִיּ֑וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> גָד֥וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>for great</n> בְּקִרְבֵּ֖ךְ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> קְד֥וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>[is] the Holy One</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> פ
